p: -In the first one, a compound has been identified in the aerial parts of Ferula flabelliloba on the basis of its mass spectrum as being cadina-1(10),4-dien-8β-ol [ 20]. However, the structure represented by the authors, drawing a cis stereochemistry of H6 (hydrogen of the ring junction) and the isopropyl group and a trans stereochemistry of the isopropyl and hydroxyl groups, was rather that of the 8α isomer ( Figure 3). Moreover, it could be pointed out that the measured retention index (RI) (CP Sil 5 CB) = 1678 [ 20] fitted with RI (CP Sil 5 CB) = 1680 measured for the 8α isomer [ 21] and RI (DB1) measured for the 8β isomer (1676; this work).
